item.title: What's a Lambda?
item.description: This document is a brief investigation into the question: What is a lambda? And, in our context, more specifically, what is lambda in computer languages, and even more specifically, what is lambda in Java. Java added lambda expressions in 2014 (see Java SE 8). Caveat: Nothing in this document is meant to be exhaustive. It’s not the final word on anything. And there most likely are errors in it â€“ in fact, most definitely.
